channel.title: CVE Feed for koush -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for koush -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47620|2024-02-13T00:01:01.140Z -- koush -- scrypted
item.description: Scrypted is a home video integration and automation platform. In versions 0.55.0 and prior, a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the plugin-http.ts file via the `owner' and 'pkg` parameters. An attacker can run arbitrary JavaScript code.

item.title: CVE-2023-47623|2024-02-13T00:00:53.415Z -- koush -- scrypted
item.description: Scrypted is a home video integration and automation platform. In versions 0.55.0 and prior, a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the login page via the `redirect_uri` parameter. By specifying a url with the javascript scheme (`javascript:`), an attacker can run arbitrary JavaScript code after the login.
